name: colorectal adenoma
definition: An intestinal benign neoplasm that has_material_basis_in epithelial tissue of glandular origin and is located_in colon and located_in rectum. [url:https\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Colorectal_adenoma]

evidence.efficacyEvidence: In a clinical study, high COX2 expression was associated with decreased colorectal adenoma development following chemopreventive treatment with Celebra (celecoxib) in patients at high risk for developing colorectal adenomas (RR, 0.37; 95% CI, 0.22-0.61; p=0.0001) (PMID: 29769213).

references.title: Expression of COX-2 and 15-PGDH in adenomas removed during pretreatment colonoscopy to predict chemopreventive efficacy of the selective COX-2 inhibitor, celecoxib.
Chemopreventive Efficacy of the Cyclooxygenase-2 (Cox-2) Inhibitor, Celecoxib, Is Predicted by Adenoma Expression of Cox-2 and 15-PGDH.
